idAbs.para: For the set of input values, iteration will stop if all the input values meet the specified conditon of either True or False. It is functionally similar to While iterator but is useful to stop a model if there is one While iterator in a model and no additional iterators can be added.

summary.para: For the set of input values, iteration will stop if all the input values meet the specified conditon of either True or False. It is functionally similar to While iterator but is useful to stop a model if there is one While iterator in a model and no additional iterators can be added.

pythonReference.para: Input values to check whether to stop the model iteration.

dialogReference.para: Input values to check whether to stop the model iteration.

pythonReference.para: Choose True of False to set the condition.

bulletList.bullet_item: True— Iteration will run until all the input values are True. This is the default.
False— Iteration will run until all in input values are False.

dialogReference.para: Choose True of False to set the condition.

bulletList.bullet_item: True— Iteration will run until all the input values are True. This is the default.
False— Iteration will run until all in input values are False.

bullet_item.para: This tool is intended for use in ModelBuilder and not in Python scripting.
